metadata.title: CVE-2021-26945 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An integer overflow leading to a heap-buffer overflow was found in OpenEXR in versions before 3.0.1. An attacker could use this flaw to crash an application compiled with OpenEXR.

notes.note: mdeslaur> it looks like the fix for this issue actually went into the exrcheck tool used by the fuzzer

criterions.comment: openexr package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
